summary: RECALL WAS ISSUED OVER ONE YEAR AGO, I HAVE NOT BEEN CONTACTED ABOUT A REPAIR, I CONTACTED A FORD DEALER AND WAS TOLD NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. I CAN NOT HAVE A PASSENGER RIDE IN MY VEHICLE DUE TO THE DANGER THAT MIGHT HAPPEN. FORD MOTOR COMPANY SHOULD IMMEDIATELY REPAIR , REPLACE OR BUY MY VEHICLE BACK FROM ME.
